channel.title: Projects on Satyak's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Satyak's Portfolio

item.title: Telecom Customer Churn Prediction
item.description: Project Summary Predicting which customer will most likely leave the network in advance will help the network provider to provide them with proper plans that will make them happy.

item.title: Flight Fare Prediction
item.description: Project Summary Flight ticket prices can be something hard to guess, today we might see a price, check out the price of the same flight tomorrow, it will be a different story.

item.title: Movie Recommendation System
item.description: Project Summary The Simple Recommender offers generalized recommnendations to every user based on movie popularity and (sometimes) genre.

item.title: Twitter Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Project Summary The task is to build a model that will determine the tone (neutral, positive, negative) of the text.

item.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
item.description: Project Summary The dataset contains transactions made by credit cards in September 2013 by European cardholders.

item.title: House Price Prediction
item.description: Project Summary Ask a home buyer to describe their dream house, and they probably won’t begin with the height of the basement ceiling or the proximity to an east-west railroad.

item.title: Iris Flower Species Prediction
item.description: Project Summary The Iris flower data set is a multivariate data set introduced by the British statistician and biologist Ronald Fisher in his 1936 paper The use of multiple measurements in taxonomic problems.

item.title: Hotel Booking Prediction
item.description: Project Summary This data set contains booking information for a city hotel and a resort hotel, and includes information such as when the booking was made, length of stay, the number of adults, children, and/or babies, and the number of available parking spaces, among other things.

item.title: Titanic Survival Prediction
item.description: Project Summary The sinking of the Titanic is one of the most infamous shipwrecks in history.
